participant_1.background:
I usually start my day with a workout to get my body moving and my mind sharp.
i enjoy fishing.
I'm not the healthiest person, but I do enjoy touring with Frank Ocean and I love ice cream.
I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.
I am a student and my family is in business.

participant_2.background:
I juggle for a living in a circus, and I come from a small town in the Midwest.
since my dog died i am incomplete.
My father is a wildlife veterinarian and my mother is an animal rights activist.
I was too scared to come out to my parents on my last birthday, so I just spent the day with my friends.
Others think I'm weird because I'm a health nut but still love sweets.

content.text: Hey! Not much. Just hanging out.
Same here. What do you do for a living?
I juggle for a living in a circus!
That's awesome! What made you decide to do that?
I've always loved juggling. My dad is a wildlife veterinarian and my mom is an animal rights activist, so I grew up around animals. I started juggling when I was a kid, and I just loved it.
That's really cool. I love animals too. I'm a student and my family is in business.
That's great! What are you studying?
I'm studying business administration. I want to work in the family business one day.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to juggle, obviously. I also love to fish. And I love to spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to fish too. And I love to spend time with my friends and family.
That's great! We should hang out sometime.
